mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_code AS "orderCode", a.foreign_order_id AS "foreignOrderId", a.arrive_time AS "arriveTime", a.order_source AS "orderSource", a.operator_id AS "operatorId", a.operator_name AS "operatorName", a.generate_time AS "generateTime", a.warehouse_id AS "warehouseId", a.delete_user_id AS "deleteUserId", a.delete_user_name AS "deleteUserName", a.delete_time AS "deleteTime", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.operator_dept_id AS "operatorDeptId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product_receive( id, order_code, foreign_order_id, arrive_time, order_source, operator_id, operator_name, generate_time, warehouse_id, delete_user_id, delete_user_name, delete_time, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, operator_dept_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderCode}, #{foreignOrderId}, #{arriveTime}, #{orderSource}, #{operatorId}, #{operatorName}, #{generateTime}, #{warehouseId}, #{deleteUserId}, #{deleteUserName}, #{deleteTime}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{operatorDeptId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_product_receive SET order_code = #{orderCode}, foreign_order_id = #{foreignOrderId}, arrive_time = #{arriveTime}, order_source = #{orderSource}, operator_id = #{operatorId}, operator_name = #{operatorName}, generate_time = #{generateTime}, warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}, delete_user_id = #{deleteUserId}, delete_user_name = #{deleteUserName}, delete_time = #{deleteTime}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, operator_dept_id =#{operatorDeptId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.order_code from t_product_receive t where t.del_flag='0' and t.order_code like CONCAT (#{code},'%') ORDER BY order_code DESC LIMIT 0,1

select a.id as receiptBillId, a.operator_id as creatorId, a.operator_name as creatorName, a.warehouse_id as warehouseId, w.`name` as warehouseName, a.`status` as receiptBillStatusKey, a.order_code as receiptBillCode, a.arrive_time as arrivalDate, a.order_source as receiptBillSourceKey, a.foreign_order_id as externalBillCode, d.id as receiptDetailId, d.receiver_id as checkerId, d.receiver_name as checkerName, d.receive_time as checkDate, d.amount as arrivalAmount, d.qualified_amount as qualifiedAmount, d.unqualified_amount as unqualifiedAmount, d.unqualified_introduction as unqualifiedDesc, d.receive_introduction as introduction, d.material_code as materialCode, d.material_name as materialName, d.material_model as modelType, d.material_spec as specification, d.unit as unitName, d.material_type_id as materialCategoryCode, d.material_type_name as materialCategoryName, d.bar_code as barCode from t_product_receive a LEFT JOIN t_warehouse_info w on w.id=a.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN t_product_receive_detail d on d.product_receive_id=a.id where a.del_flag=0 and d.del_flag=0 and a.id=#{receiptBillId}
